org.cpsolver.instructor.criteria

Class SameDays

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.ifs.criteria.AbstractCriterion<TeachingRequest.Variable,TeachingAssignment>
      • org.cpsolver.instructor.criteria.InstructorSchedulingCriterion
        • org.cpsolver.instructor.criteria.SameDays
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanHoldContext, HasAssignmentContext<TeachingRequest.Variable,TeachingAssignment,AbstractCriterion.ValueContext>, Criterion<TeachingRequest.Variable,TeachingAssignment>, ExtendedInfoProvider<TeachingRequest.Variable,TeachingAssignment>, InfoProvider<TeachingRequest.Variable,TeachingAssignment>, ModelListener<TeachingRequest.Variable,TeachingAssignment>

    public class SameDays
extends InstructorSchedulingCriterion
    Same Days. This criterion counts how well are the same days preferences that are set on an Instructor met (counting Instructor.countSameDays(Assignment, TeachingAssignment, double, double)).
    Version:
    IFS 1.3 (Instructor Sectioning)
    Copyright (C) 2016 Tomáš Müller
    muller@unitime.org
    http://muller.unitime.org

    This library is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

    This library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU Lesser General Public License for more details.

    You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License along with this library; if not see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
    Author:
    Tomáš Müller
